about_the_game:
Cozy Cottage Pack is an official collection of material suited for RPG Maker MV and RPG Maker MZ.


■ Pointy-eared characters waiting for you to tell their story!
Each character is designed with enough personality for you to find the inspiration needed to give them any story you’d like!

■ The tilesets are suited for backgrounds centered around nature and cottage aesthetics.
It is recommended you use them in combination with other tiles such as the original RPG Maker tilesets!

■ Includes a custom Window Skin to fit the wood-centric theme of the pack!

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Characters：1 sheet（8 characters）
Faces: 8 sheet
Pictures: 114 (facing right 57、facing left 57)
sv_actors : 8 sheet
system(window): 1
tilesets(B~E): 1 sheet
